scripts.build:client-production: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --display-modules --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build:client-qa: NODE_ENV=qa BABEL_ENV=qa node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --display-modules --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build:client-stage: NODE_ENV=stage BABEL_ENV=stage node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --display-modules --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build:server-production: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.build:server-qa: NODE_ENV=qa BABEL_ENV=qa node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.build:server-stage: NODE_ENV=stage BABEL_ENV=stage node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.build:production: npm run clean && npm run build:client-production && npm run build:server-production
scripts.build:qa: npm run clean && npm run build:client-qa && npm run build:server-qa
scripts.build:stage: npm run clean && npm run build:client-stage && npm run build:server-stage
scripts.start:analyzer: npm run stop && ANALYZER=true pm2 start --interpreter babel-node src/server
scripts.start:production: npm run stop & npm run build:production && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production pm2 start --interpreter babel-node src/server
scripts.start:qa: npm run stop && npm run build:qa && NODE_ENV=qa BABEL_ENV=qa pm2 start --interpreter babel-node src/server
scripts.start:stage: npm run stop && npm run build:stage && NODE_ENV=stage BABEL_ENV=stage pm2 start --interpreter babel-node src/server
scripts.start: npm run clean & cross-env NODE_ENV=local BABEL_ENV=local nodemon src/server --watch src/server --watch src/shared --exec babel-node --presets es2015,stage-2
